lyric:
[by:龙叔与Doc的旅行日记]
[length: 01:45.694]
[tool: 歌词滚动姬 https://lrc-maker.github.io]
[00:05.645] I'm riding on my bike
[00:08.757] I'm going round the block
[00:11.714] No, I can't cross the road
[00:14.819] I'm not allowed to do that
[00:17.837] I'm so happy here 'cause
[00:20.890] I'm just riding on my bike
[00:24.290] I'm going round the block
[00:27.348] I'm checking out the dogs
[00:30.712] Barking as I pass them, woof
[00:33.753] Barking back, I laugh and
[00:37.006] I ride on on my bike
[00:40.261] I'm going round the block
[00:43.517] I'm singing to myself, la la la
[00:46.519] I'm counting purple flowers
[00:49.625] And I'll do this for hours
[00:52.815] Happy riding on my bike
[00:55.952] I'm going round the block
[00:59.224] I'm like an ice cream truck
[01:02.276] I'm tasting all the flavors
[01:05.335] I'm waving to my neighbors, hi
[01:08.507] While I'm riding on my bike
[01:11.988] I'm going round the block
[01:15.341] I'm counting all the cracks, 6, 7, 8
[01:18.179] Yeah, I'm the pavement agent
[01:21.135] And my house is the station
[01:24.309] And I ride past on my bike
[01:27.663] I'm going round the block
[01:30.863] My tummy's rumbling
[01:33.996] My mama's selling tickets
[01:37.134] To broccoli and fish sticks, I'm hungry
tlyric:
[by:Cepohalm]
[00:05.645]我正骑着我的自行车
[00:08.757]环绕着这街区
[00:11.714]哦不,我不能过马路
[00:14.819]我没有被许可(去过马路)
[00:17.837]我在这很嗨皮的
[00:20.890]因为我只是骑着车兜风
[00:24.290]绕着这街区四处兜风
[00:27.348]哦~看看那些狗勾
[00:30.712]每当我经过,他们都会嗷嗷叫
[00:33.753]而我的笑便是对犬吠的回答
[00:37.006]我正骑着车兜风
[00:40.261]绕着街区四处转圈圈
[00:43.517]我迎风高歌
[00:46.519]数着那些紫色的花朵
[00:49.625]几个小时都不觉得厌倦
[00:52.815]我乐呵呵的骑着我的自行车
[00:55.952]绕着这街区四处兜风
[00:59.224]就像一辆冰激凌车
[01:02.276]把酸甜苦辣都尝了个遍
[01:05.335]我向邻居们挥手问好
[01:08.507]而我还在骑着车兜风
[01:11.988]绕这街区四处转圈圈
[01:15.341]数着地面上的裂纹
[01:18.179]芜湖~我就是马路的代理人
[01:21.135]我的家就是个公交站
[01:24.309]而我骑着车"嗖"地就过去了
[01:27.663]绕着这栋街区四处兜风
[01:30.863]我午餐铃响个不停
[01:33.996]我妈妈还在买票
[01:37.134]来个西兰花加烤鱼,我饿了
